# Part I

Make sure you have read the ReadMe file.

### A) Git basics
Fork this repository https://github.com/munoztd0/Data_Wrangling_NeuroMaster onto your github page.
Clone YOUR fork (e.g. git clone https://github.com/YOURUSERNAME/Data_Wrangling_NeuroMaster inside a terminal)
Open the test.txt file, add whatever you want e.g. "doneso") and save it.
Now open up you terminal within the "Data_Wrangling_NeuroMaster" directory, and type :
```{bash}
git add -A
git commit -m "test"
git push 
```
